title: Finding Falcone
description: Using given conditions, your coding problem is to help King Shan in finding Al Falcone. However he has limited resources at his disposal & can send his army to some of planets.

title: Admin UI
description: Suppose you are working at a startup that is building an interface for admins to see and delete users. The users will be provided via an API. Your job is to build out a working UI.

title: Food Ordering App
description: Develop a feature-rich Food Ordering App using live APIs within the Parcel-React framework. Implement a comprehensive range of essential React concepts, including Routing, Hooks, Function and Class components, Shimmer UI, and many more, to ensure a robust and engaging user experience.

title: This Portfolio
description: I have crafted this dynamic and interactive portfolio using Vite-React, seamlessly showcasing all my practice projects, skills, and experience. Explore my journey, delve into my skill set, and gain insights into my current tech stack as I navigate through the realms of web development and innovation.
